articles.title: NBA fines Jazz ($500K), Pacers ($100K) for sitting players - ESPN
articles.description: The NBA on Thursday night fined the Utah Jazz $500,000 and the Indiana Pacers $100,000 due to what the league called "management of their rosters for recent games."
articles.content:
Feb 12, 2026, 08:51 PM ET
The NBA on Thursday night fined the Utah Jazz $500,000 and the Indiana Pacers $100,000, with the league saying both teams sat healthy players in recent games while noting t… [+3019 chars]
